definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
Northeast Plain, also called the Manchurian Plain
Pingyuan county in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong
Songliao Plain of northeast China including Songhua River 松花江 through the Liaoning Peninsula, also called the Northeast Plain 東北平原|东北平原[Dong1 bei3 Ping2 yuan2]
Sanjiang or Three rivers plain in Heilongjiang, vast wetland watered by Heilongjiang 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] or Amur, Songhua 松花江[Song1 hua1 jiang1], Ussuri 烏蘇里江|乌苏里江[Wu1 su1 li3 jiang1]
(bird species of China) tawny pipit (Anthus campestris)

pinyin: Suo3 er3 zi1 bo2 li3 ping2 yuan2

definition: Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河

sentences.english: The couple arrived at a plain first.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇先来到一个平原。

sentences.english: Plain of two-thirds of the total.
sentences.chinese: 平原占总面积的三分之二。

sentences.english: The rolling plains and the wild flowers, the boxing ring and a few old scores to settle.
sentences.chinese: 起伏的平原和野花，拳赛场地和要解决的旧帐。

sentences.english: And a plain vast and bare in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 化成面前的广漠的平原。

sentences.english: The river debouches into a wide plain.
sentences.chinese: 这条河进入一片广阔的平原。

sentences.english: The central area is characterized by many lakes, bogs and low ridges.
sentences.chinese: 中部的平原地带以众多的湖泊，沼泽和低岭为特点。

sentences.english: This site is located slightly north from the centre of the Hetao plain on the northern edge of the Xixia (Tangut) domain.
sentences.chinese: 该遗址位于河套平原中部偏北，地处西夏国的北部。

sentences.english: Analysis on the ecological characteristics, there was a flooded plain at that time.
sentences.chinese: 从生态特征分析，当时可能为一泛滥平原。

sentences.english: Studying on groundwater in Hebei Plain has been an academic focus all the time.
sentences.chinese: 河北平原地下水的研究一直以来都是学者关注的焦点。

sentences.english: It was discovered that the whole of Hebei plain show a descending tendency.
sentences.chinese: 整个河北平原都存在着下降的趋势。

sentences.english: The mammoth buffalo roamed the plains.
sentences.chinese: 庞大的野牛群出没在这些平原上。

sentences.english: May be hard to pull off in some hilly cities.
sentences.chinese: 在平原城市还好，在丘陵城市就有点吃力了。

sentences.english: As it approaches the sea, the river meanders over the coastal plain.
sentences.chinese: 快要入海时，印度河在沿海平原里蜿蜒流淌。

sentences.english: Don't look back, and don't stop anywhere in the plain!
sentences.chinese: 不可回头看，也不可在平原站住。

sentences.english: Chengdu is the capital of Sichuan and is the cultural and industrial center for the agricultural Chengdu Plain.
sentences.chinese: 成都是四川的省会，也是成都平原的文化和工业中心。

definition: Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
